titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 901) to preserve the sovereignty of the United States over public lands and acquired lands owned by the United States, and to preserve State sovereignty and private property rights in non-Federal lands surrounding those public lands and acquired lands.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-268, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 901 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Resources now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 97.

bill.summary: 9/24/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 901 (Federal land designations).
